title: Ahri Statue still unavailable?
body: It's getting into late afternoon in the States and still no Ahri statue available on the merch store. They said it would be available 7th Dec (it's getting well into the 8th for us ): ) but there's been no word about it still being unavailable. Does anyone know anything about it?

replies.body:
Hey this post pretty much sums it up. 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/sdp49Ers-why-were-not-releasing-the-ahri-statue
Thanks was waiting for something like that to pop up :)

Hey Seras Dragon - I'm not on the merch team but hopefully I can answer your question.

First off, apologies for any inconvenience caused by the Ahri statue promotion! It's a pretty dope piece of merch and I've been pretty keen to get my hands on one as well. Regarding the delay, the TL;DR is that we received a lot of feedback about Ahri's face (specifically, the eye makeup and finer details are a bit off), and we're revising the design to make sure you guys get the product you deserve. 

Junko posted a link to Riot Bradmore's announcement below, but [here it is again](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/sdp49Ers-why-were-not-releasing-the-ahri-statue) if you want to see the full context behind the decision.
oo thank you I had been waiting for something like that :) Someone on reddit mentioned they might be redesigning it and there would probably be an announcement sometime :)

Maybe they meant the 7th for the U.S. Which means it could become available at any time during the 7th so possibly not out till later on or possibly tomorrow?

Just guessing here.
It's about 5pm (EST) on the 7th over there atm :(

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gegJEQRq,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-12-07T21:47:14.912+0000)
>
> It's about 5pm (EST) on the 7th over there atm :(

But it's not the 8th yet =D.

They are probably just slow.

Just think back to Azir...

now all waiting will feel like no time at all.
